Analog_Output.name: Analog Output
Analog_Output.description: This IPSO object is a generic object that can be used with any kind of analog output interface.

Analog_Output_Current_Value.name: Analog Output Current Value
Analog_Output_Current_Value.description: The current state of the analogue output.

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: If present, the application type of the actuator as a string, for instance, "Valve"

Min_Range_Value.name: Min Range Value
Min_Range_Value.description: The minimum value that can be set for the output

Max_Range_Value.name: Max Range Value
Max_Range_Value.description: The maximum value that can be set for the output
